description:
Add an extension to your Swiftlet hammock and make the most of your hang time. This little bar extends your Swiftlet stand by more than 35cm, that’s like going from a twin bed to a king, it’s pretty luxurious.

  • Powder coated spring steel construction is built to last
  • Compatible with Swiftlet portable hammock stand and accommodates Roo Double, Roo Double XL, and other camping-style hammocks with a minimum length of 3.15m (124in)
  • Max weight capacity: 136kg (300lbs)
name: Kammok Swiftlet Long Bar
